text: Banwarilal Purohit (born 16 April 1939) is an Indian politician. He is the current and 21st Governor of Tamil Nadu since October 2017. He was appointed as Governor of Assam State by President of India on 17 August 2016. He was a Member of Parliament from the Nagpur (Lok Sabha constituency) three times, twice as an Indian National Congress member, once as a BJP member.Former Cong leader who claimed he arranged meeting between Rajiv & RSSBJP leader Purohit is new governor of Assam ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Assam Category:Governors of Tamil Nadu Category:Governors of Meghalaya Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Banwarilal Purohit
